title: The Mighty Hellhound Gets A... Downgrade? | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment: "No dog. Wrong boy." When you realise you've wasted 11 years of your life raising the wrong kid 😂
I love how the kids are throwing food and stuff around and everyone but Crowley gets something on them
I laughed when I saw the Hellhound because they used a Great Dane for it. I look across to my own Great Dane (same markings) and think, "Yeah, right."
Crowley wearing white and Aziraphale wearing black
That's no downgrade. That's a pupgrade!
description:
Imagine a dog transforming from wanting to eat your face to wanting to lick your face, in one simple word.
» SUBSCRIBE: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwSIJ...
